content: this simple crochet scarf pattern has such a fun raised texture the alternating bean stitch clusters look like little shells scattered about it is feminine and unique but still easy enough for beginners the pattern is a simple 4 row repeat that incorporates only a few basic stitches once you get the repeat down you can just keep going until the scarf is as long as you like please note that an ad-free pdf version of this pattern is available for purchase in my ravelry store to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/simple-crochet-scarf-pattern materials 328 yards size 4 yarn i used yarn bee yarn id in soft shell us j / 6 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors sizing 8 ¾ wide and 74 long not including fringe length can be adjusted to your preference stitches used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch fsc foundation single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet special stitch bean stitch
